title: RIL acquires 25% stake in US deep-tech company for $15 million - Times of India
content: RIL acquires 25% stake in US deep-tech company for $15 million  Times of India
description: India Business News: MUMBAI: Mukesh Ambani-controlled Reliance Industries (RIL) has invested $15 million in Silicon Valley-based deep-tech startup Two Platforms for a 25% .
